translation.en: [kid] Whoaaa! Whoo-hoo!
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
-Whoaaa! -Oh, the humanity!
Hold on, everybody.
We're experiencing my favorite thing about air travel: turbulence.
translation.it: Ecco la mia cosa preferita dei viaggi aerei: la turbolenza!

translation.en: And here comes my second-favorite thing. Wind shear!
translation.it: - Oh, no. - E la seconda: le raffiche di vento!

translation.en: I hope we don't find out what your third-favorite thing is, Ms. Frizzle. Can't you get us out of this?
translation.it: Spero di non scoprire la terza, Miss Frizzle! Può tirarci fuori?

translation.en: Well, here's the challenge, Arnold.
translation.it: Ecco la sfida, Arnold. Una mongolfiera ad aria calda

translation.en: Because this is a hot-air balloon, I can't steer it.
translation.it: Ecco la sfida, Arnold. Una mongolfiera ad aria calda non è manovrabile. Posso fare solo tre cose: farla salire…

translation.en: I can only make it do three things: go up...
translation.it: non è manovrabile. Posso fare solo tre cose: farla salire…

translation.en: Go down...
What's the third thing? Go down fast!
I knew I should've stayed home today!
translation.it: Sapevo che dovevo rimanere a casa!

translation.en: Don't say that, Arnold. This is all because of you, remember?
translation.it: Non dire così, Arnold. È tutto merito tuo, ricordi?

translation.en: Happy birthday, Arnold!
I made this card for you.
[Arnold] Hmm. You really captured my essence.
And don't forget about your biggest present.
translation.it: E ricorda il regalo più grande.

translation.en: You, Arnold, get to choose... our field trip.
translation.it: Tu, Arnold, sceglierai la nostra gita.

translation.en: I guess we're staying home today.
Even better.
We're headed to the International Balloon Fiesta in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Come on! Whoo-hoo!
translation.it: Andremo ad Albuquerque, Nuovo Messico, alla Fiesta della Mongolfiera! Urrà!

translation.en: -[kids cheering] -[Bus honks]
OK, here we go.
Huh?
isn't the balloon supposed to be... balloon-y?
translation.it: Il pallone non dovrebbe essere… gonfio?

translation.en: Where's the helium?
[Ms. Frizzle] No helium in hot-air balloons, Ralphie.
The clue is in the words "hot" and "air."
No problem. Ralphie's full of that.
OK. First, we put in the air.
Why isn't it rising?
It won't rise until we put in the hot.
I remember this. When you heat something, the molecules move faster!
translation.it: Me lo ricordo! Con il calore, le molecole si muovono più velocemente!

translation.en: Fast-moving air molecules will spread apart and fill the balloon!
translation.it: Si espandono e riempiono il pallone!

translation.en: And when air molecules spread apart, the air is less dense.
translation.it: Ed espandendosi, l'aria diventa meno densa.

translation.en: Hot, less-dense air rises above the cooler, denser air outside the balloon.
translation.it: L'aria calda e meno densa sale sopra l'aria esterna più fredda e densa.

translation.en: [Jyoti] The hot air rises, taking the balloon along with it!
translation.it: L'aria calda sale, portando con sé il pallone!

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] OK, class!
-All aboard! -Come on!
-This is amazing! -Full speed ahead!
Full speed? Oh, no, no, no, no, no.
Balloons don't have engines or rockets to push them forward.
translation.it: Le mongolfiere non hanno motori o razzi.

translation.en: They just go up and down. That's why I love them.
translation.it: Vanno solo su e giù. Perciò le adoro.

translation.en: Then... how do we go anywhere?
We just drift along on the currents of air,
like floating down a lazy river on a fully inspected, totally leakproof raft.
translation.it: Come navigare un pigro fiume su un battello sicuro e resistente.

translation.en: Kick back and relax for... the best field trip ever!
translation.it: E ora rilassatevi e godetevi… la miglior gita che abbiamo mai fatto.

translation.en: You said hot-air balloons were quiet and gentle drifting on currents of air.
translation.it: Avevi detto che sarebbe stata mite e tranquilla.

translation.en: How could I know we'd hit a thunderstorm?
Oh, I don't know... by checking your forecast?
translation.it: Non lo so. Potevi guardare le previsioni!

translation.en: Don't worry! We'll be fine as long as we don't get hit by...
translation.it: Non preoccupatevi! Andrà tutto bene se non ci colpirà un…

translation.en: [kids] Lightning!
Whoo-hoo!
Dude, what just happened?
Where did the sun go?
Is it just the three of us? Where's everybody else?
translation.it: Siamo solo noi tre? Dove sono gli altri?

translation.en: And what's up with the Bus?
Bigger question: where are we?
-Uh, guys? -[Ms. Frizzle singing] Something funny is happening...
translation.it: Ragazzi? Sta accadendo qualcosa di strano.

translation.en: ♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki ♪
translation.it: Siamo su un limpido mare blu A Waikiki

translation.en: ♪ But something funny's going on with me ♪ Kapow!
translation.it: Ma mi succede qualcosa di strano Bum!

translation.en: ♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
Get it? Hangin'?
Because we're suspended from a hot-air balloon, of course. Also... [snorts]
translation.it: Perché siamo sospesi su una mongolfiera. E poi…

translation.en: We're in Hawaii! [laughs]
♪ We're on a clear blue sea in Waikiki... ♪
translation.it: Siamo su un limpido mare blu A Waikiki

translation.en: What are you guys doing?
Dancing! It's super catchy!
♪ You're hangin' with the Frizz ♪
Intense. That was crazy loud.
translation.it: Intenso. E rumoroso in modo assurdo.

translation.en: You mean the storm or Arnold's screams?
translation.it: La tempesta o le urla di Arnold?

translation.en: Hey... Where is Arnold?
And everyone else?
I know this coastline. Last time I was here, I faced one of my most death-defying adventures,
translation.it: Conosco la costa. Qui ho avuto una delle mie avventure terrificanti:

translation.en: the Buried Mummy of Chan-Chan. Upside is, I know how long it takes to dig out of a tomb
translation.it: la mummia sepolta di Chan Chan. So quanto ci vuole a scavare una tomba

translation.en: with nothing but a belt buckle and a button. Welcome to Peru, kids!
translation.it: con una fibbia e un bottone. Benvenuti in Perù, ragazzi!

translation.en: -Peru? -Button?
But what about the Balloon Fiesta?
Balloon Fiesta? [groans]
Where's the adventure in that?
Let's take this baby to the Andes Mountains and surf some serious air currents!
translation.it: Andiamo sulle Ande e cavalchiamo delle vere correnti.

translation.en: That's an adventure! -Hold on to your shirts... -[flames roar]
[Ms. Frizzle] Yeah!
DA! Liz! Are you all right?
Wait... Am I all right? I've lost the ability to see the rest of the class!
translation.it: Ma io sto bene? Non ho più la capacità di vedere il resto della classe!

translation.en: -Oh, no! I'm class blind! -No, you're not.
translation.it: Oh, no! Ho la cecità di classe! Non è vero.

translation.en: -They're not here. It's just us. -[Arnold shudders]
translation.it: Non sono qui. Siamo solo noi.

translation.en: This is like my recurring dream of a field trip descending into total chaos.
translation.it: Sogno sempre che la gita diventa un disastro.

translation.en: Only, oh, wait! That dream is real. And it's every single trip!
translation.it: Ma… Oh, quel sogno è reale. E succede a ogni gita!

translation.en: I admit this is stranger than usual, Arnold, but we'll figure it out.
translation.it: È vero, è più strano del solito, Arnold, ma capiremo.

translation.en: How? Ms. Frizzle is gone.
I'll never get to tell her how much I actually learned from her.
translation.it: Non potrò dirle quanto ho imparato da lei.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] There's much more to learn, Arnold,
like how not to talk about people when they aren't there.
translation.it: Come a non parlare di chi non c'è.

translation.en: [stammers] Ms. Frizzle?
Yes, and that is clearly the iconic lighthouse of Peggy's Cove, Nova Scotia.
translation.it: Sì, e quello è l'iconico faro di Peggy's Cove, Nuova Scozia.

translation.en: Nova Scotia, Canada? What happened during the storm
translation.it: Nuova Scozia, Canada? Come siamo finiti sul lato opposto del continente?

translation.en: that we ended up on the opposite side of the continent from Albuquerque?
translation.it: Come siamo finiti sul lato opposto del continente?

translation.en: When lightning struck the Bus, the power surge caused a rupture. The Bus has clearly been split and separated.
translation.it: La sovratensione causata dal fulmine ha diviso e separato lo scuolabus.

translation.en: Where's everyone else? An excellent question, Dorothy Ann.
translation.it: - Dove sono gli altri? - Ottima domanda, DA.

translation.en: Class, what would be the best way to find them?
Well, if the other FrizzPad is with the other part of the Bus...
translation.it: Se l'altro Tablet è nell'altra parte del bus…

translation.en: We should be able to track them!
Good thinking, you two. I would also have accepted "Scream their names as loudly as we can."
-This FrizzPad's on the fritz! -[beeping]
There we go.
I think we found them, but...
could this be right? The other half of the Bus is in...
translation.it: è possibile? Il resto dello scuolabus è…

translation.en: Peru?
Guys! Someone's calling us! Please let it be a rescue team!
translation.it: - Ehi, qualcuno sta chiamando. - Che siano i soccorsi!

translation.en: Wanda! You're OK!
-Arnold! Am I glad to see you! -Hey, Arn!
translation.it: - Arnold! Che bello vederti! - Ehi, Arn!

translation.en: -We were starting to get worried. -Where's the rest of the class?
translation.it: - Eravamo in pensiero. - Dove sono gli altri?

translation.en: We're in Nova Scotia, Canada, but it's just DA and me.
translation.it: Siamo in Nuova Scozia, Canada. Ma solo io e DA.

translation.en: Hold on! A part of the Bus is also in... -Hawaii! -[device beeps]
translation.it: Aspettate. Una parte dello scuolabus è alle… Hawaii!

translation.en: Am I glad to see you guys! I need help immediately!
translation.it: Sono così felice di vedervi! Mi serve aiuto immediato! Abbiamo un problemino.

translation.en: I've got a situation over here.
translation.it: Mi serve aiuto immediato! Abbiamo un problemino.

translation.en: Carlos, Ralphie and Ms. Frizzle won't stop acting silly, even more than usual.
translation.it: Carlos, Ralphie e Miss Frizzle fanno i buffoni. Più del solito.

translation.en: But... that's not possible!
Oh, I assure you, it is very possible!
translation.it: - Ti assicuro che è possibile. - Sì! Ehi!

translation.en: No. How can Ms. Frizzle be with you when she's here with us in Peru right now?
translation.it: No. Come fa Miss Frizzle a essere lì se è con noi in Perù?

translation.en: -See? -Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
You know how they say you can never have too much of a good thing?
translation.it: Sapete come si dice: una cosa bella non è mai troppa?

translation.en: Well, we all have a Frizzle!
translation.it: Beh, abbiamo tutti una Miss Frizzle.

translation.en: Surprise.
[laughs] You get a Frizzle! She gets a Frizzle! We all get Frizzles!
translation.it: Hai vinto una Frizzle! Tutti hanno vinto una Frizzle.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle split into three? Ah! This is all starting to make sense now.
translation.it: - Miss Frizzle si è divisa in tre? - Tutto comincia ad avere senso.

translation.en: Really? Uh, according to my research... Oh, who am I kidding? There's no research to support this!
translation.it: Davvero? Secondo la mia ricerca… Che dico? Non ci sono ricerche a sostegno!

translation.en: This is impossible!
Improbable, but not impossible, Dorothy Ann.
This isn't my first split.
Last time I experienced a magic rupture, I fractured into three parts as well.
translation.it: Ho già avuto una rottura magica, separandomi in tre parti.

translation.en: What you're seeing is only one-third of me.
translation.it: Quello che vedete è un terzo di me.

translation.en: There's also the wacky, goofy, silly side of me. I call her "The Frizz."
translation.it: Ho anche un lato divertente e sciocco. Dire frizzante.

translation.en: [laughs] Wacky, goofy side? Never met her!
She sounds pretty awesome, though, eh? Eh?
And I'm the daring, adventurous side. Fiona!
translation.it: Io sono il lato audace e intrepido: Fiona!

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo!
Inconceivable! Our Frizz just jumped out of the balloon!
translation.it: Inaudito! La nostra Friz si è lanciata dal pallone!

translation.en: -What? -[laughs] Classic me!
And then there's this part of me.
translation.it: Poi c'è questo lato di me.

translation.en: The reliable teacher who only wants to observe and learn from a safe distance.
translation.it: L'insegnante affidabile che osserva da distanza sicura.

translation.en: Music to my ears.
Good. Then please sit. Sitting is 77.84% safer than standing.
translation.it: Bene. Sedetevi. Stare seduti è il 77,84% più sicuro che stare in piedi.

translation.en: And swinging is 100% more fun than sitting! Whooo-hoo!
translation.it: E oscillare in aria è il 100% più divertente che sedersi! Wow!

translation.en: Uh, shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together?
translation.it: Troviamo il modo di riunire le tre Miss Frizzle?

translation.en: You mean, "Shouldn't we be finding a way to get all three Frizzles back together in time?"
translation.it: Vuoi dire: "Troviamo il modo di riunire le tre Miss Frizzle… in tempo?"

translation.en: In time? What do you mean, in time?
[Ms. Frizzle] Observe.
What... what's happening?
Hey! Would someone give her a hand?
translation.it: Ehi. Qualcuno le dà una mano?

translation.en: [laughs] Hey, nice one! -Whoa! -[thuds]
No one stands alone, class. Especially when they've been split into three parts.
translation.it: Nessuno funziona da solo, ragazzi. Soprattutto se diviso in tre.

translation.en: Meaning?
Yeah, unforch, the, uh, Frizzle fragments can't survive on their own.
translation.it: I frammenti di Miss Frizzle non sopravvivono separati.

translation.en: I'm fading away, and so are the others.
translation.it: Sto svanendo e anche le altre.

translation.en: That's right. If we're not reunited soon, all three of us will disappear.
translation.it: Esatto. Se non ci riuniamo, spariremo tutte e tre.

translation.en: You mean, you'll f-f-fade away f-f-forever?
translation.it: Vuoi dire che svanirà… per sempre?

translation.en: Correct. You're developing excellent comprehension skills, Arnold.
translation.it: Esatto. Ottima capacità di comprensione, Arnold.

translation.en: We just need to work on your delivery. You'll fade away forever?
translation.it: - L'espressione può migliorare. - Svanirà per sempre?

translation.en: Oh, much better.
We can't let that happen! We gotta reunite all three Frizzles! We have to do it quick!
translation.it: Non lo permetteremo! Riuniamo le tre Miss Frizzle! Veloce!

translation.en: Quickly. Adverb!
-Quickly! -Hmm.
It would make sense to get back to Albuquerque where the separation started.
translation.it: Torniamo ad Albuquerque, dove sono state separate.

translation.en: Albuquerque-ly!
What an excellent deduction, Dorothy Ann.
I'll try to coordinate with the other groups!
First-rate plan, but please stay away from the sides while pacing around the basket. Safety first.
translation.it: Ottimo piano, ma non camminare sui lati. La sicurezza prima di tutto.

translation.en: What is she even doing?
-Unsure. -But it looks like fun!
translation.it: Non lo so. Ma sembra divertente!

translation.en: Yaaaay!
Whoo-hooo!
Watch out!
-Whoo-hooo! -[thud]
-[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
-Now what? -We gotta pull her up!
Ptooey! I got a better idea!
-Whoo-whooo! -[kids] No!
[Tim] How is that a better idea?
I'll show you. I'm in a river, and so are you!
translation.it: Guardate. Siamo su un fiume. Le correnti d'acqua e d'aria sono uguali!

translation.en: Water currents are like air currents, kids!
translation.it: Siamo su un fiume. Le correnti d'acqua e d'aria sono uguali!

translation.en: Picture the air moving you along like this river is pushing me!
translation.it: L'aria ti spinge come questo fiume spinge me.

translation.en: Remarkable. She jumped into a river to teach us a lesson!
translation.it: Notevole. È saltata in un fiume per insegnarci qualcosa!

translation.en: ♪ Here we go! ♪ Whoo-hoo!
Water currents push me.
Air currents push the balloon and you! Whoo-hoo!
translation.it: Quelle d'aria spingono il pallone e voi!

translation.en: -[Jyoti] Oh, no! -Ms. Frizzle, stop looking at us!
translation.it: Oh, no! - Miss Frizzle, non guardi noi! - Guardi davanti!

translation.en: -Look in front of you! -[all] There's a waterfall!
translation.it: - Miss Frizzle, non guardi noi! - Guardi davanti! C'è una cascata!

translation.en: Whoo! Yee-ha!
[Tim] We have to get Ms. Frizzle out of there!
The Bus usually has the best gadgets. Let's see what we've got here.
translation.it: Lo scuolabus ha tanti gadget. Cerchiamo.

translation.en: -Uh... this one! -[button beeps]
How did I miss? I was aiming right for her!
translation.it: Cos'ho fatto? Ho mirato proprio lei!

translation.en: We have to take the air current into account.
So try aiming a little behind her!
translation.it: e mira un po' dietro di lei.

translation.en: Look in front of you!
It's coming up fast! [Ms. Frizzle] That's why they call 'em rapids!
Whoo-hoo!
Yee-ha!
We've got her!
Tasty save!
So, kids, while I was heading toward a waterfall, what did you learn?
translation.it: Mentre andavo verso le rapide, cosa avete appreso?

translation.en: The Bus has a magic gross lizard tongue?
translation.it: Che il bus ha lingue magiche?

translation.en: You learned that the balloon is riding air currents, the rivers of the sky!
translation.it: Che il pallone cavalca le correnti d'aria, i fiumi del cielo.

translation.en: -[kids gasp] -Oh, no!
translation.it: Che il pallone cavalca le correnti d'aria, i fiumi del cielo. Oh, no!

translation.en: Whoa! Stealth mode! [laughs] Cool!
We have to get to Albuquerque ASAP.
Then we need to head north as fast as we can!
Arnold said the balloon only moves forward on air currents.
translation.it: Secondo Arn, le correnti ci spingono.

translation.en: But you can't steer to find one, you can only go up and down. Ms. Frizzle, how do we find a current to ride?
translation.it: Ma possiamo muoverci solo su e giù. Miss Frizzle, come troviamo una corrente?

translation.en: I'm sorry, Keesha! I can't talk right now. -I'm on a very important call. -[thunder rumbles]
translation.it: Scusa, Keesha! Ora non posso. Ho una chiamata urgente.

translation.en: -Yes, I'll hold. -Seriously?
As serious as that storm behind you.
[splutters] I'm so sorry about that. It's bananas around here.
translation.it: Mi scuso, siamo alla frutta qui.

translation.en: No way I want to go through another storm.
Yeah. We might get hit with lightning again, and I might split into my three main parts:
translation.it: Sì, un altro fulmine potrebbe dividermi nelle mie tre parti:

translation.en: Ralphie, Awesome Ralphie and Super Awesome Ralphie.
translation.it: Ralphie, Immenso Ralphie e Super-Immenso Ralphie.

translation.en: The world couldn't take it. Hello? You're fading out! Oh, wait, that's me.
translation.it: - Troppo per il mondo. - Pronto? È sparito? Ah, sono io.

translation.en: She's fading? We have to find a way out of this!
The only thing I know how to do on this balloon is to go up and down. Which is it?
translation.it: L'unica cosa che posso fare è andare su o giù. Quale scelgo?

translation.en: Maybe we can see a way out from higher up. Good thinking, Carlos!
Turning up the heat makes the air inside the balloon spread out. Spreading out makes the air less dense.
translation.it: Alzando il calore, l'aria si espande nel pallone e diventa meno densa.

translation.en: And less-dense air in the balloon means... we go up!
translation.it: La minore densità… ci fa salire.

translation.en: Whoa! We're picking up speed! We must have drifted into a major air current.
translation.it: Wow! Acquistiamo velocità. Abbiamo trovato una corrente.

translation.en: Yeah! A major air current that's heading towards California.
translation.it: Sì! Una grande corrente diretta in California.

translation.en: We're going to take Hollywood by storm.
-[thunder crashes] -Specifically that storm!
We've caught a southwesterly air current. We're headed in the right direction.
translation.it: La corrente va a sud-ovest. - La direzione è giusta. - Davvero?

translation.en: Really? Wow! That's great!
translation.it: - La direzione è giusta. - Davvero? Wow. Fantastico.

translation.en: I can finally kick back and relax for my birthday.
translation.it: Posso rilassarmi per il mio compleanno.

translation.en: Relax? There's no relaxing here. There's too much to learn!
translation.it: Rilassarti? Non è possibile. C'è troppo da imparare!

translation.en: Now give me back the FrizzPad, pretty please.
Dorothy Ann, here's your homework to complete on weather patterns.
translation.it: Ecco i compiti a casa sugli schemi meteo.

translation.en: How can we do homework when we're not even home?
translation.it: Ma non siamo neanche a casa.

translation.en: Good point, Arnold. Let's just call it "balloon work."
translation.it: Ben detto, Arnold. Chiamiamoli compiti in quota.

translation.en: -Don't you just love a... -[kids scream]
We need to find an air current that's going northwest towards Albuquerque! How do we do that?
translation.it: Ci serve una corrente di nord-ovest verso Albuquerque! Come facciamo?

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Feeling a little pressure, Tim?
So is the balloon. Air pressure, that is! Uh-oh!
translation.it: Anche il pallone. Per la pressione dell'aria.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle!
And today's in-flight movie is a showing of the award-winning...
translation.it: E oggi il film a bordo è il pluripremiato…

translation.en: Hey! Who's pulling my leg... off?
-Whoa... -This is seriously strange! What happened to your leg?
translation.it: Che strano. Cos'è successo alla gamba?

translation.en: And what movie were you going to show?
What? Too soon?
A headless teacher? Why can't anything be normal?
translation.it: Un insegnante senza testa? Perché niente è mai normale?

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle! Look out!
Oh, wait. She probably can't hear me.
Why aren't you doing your balloon work? Don't you want to get ahead?
translation.it: Non avete testa per i compiti in quota?

translation.en: We got a head when yours came back! It was so weird!
translation.it: Abbiamo la sua testa. È tornata. Che strano. È sparita per molto tempo.

translation.en: Your head was gone for such a long time.
translation.it: Che strano. È sparita per molto tempo.

translation.en: Then my time is indeed running short.
All the more reason to get your studies done. I can't grade your work if I'm not around to see it.
translation.it: Perciò dovreste studiare. Non potrò valutarvi se svanirò.

translation.en: But, Ms. Frizzle, I really think we need to focus on Albuquerque!
translation.it: Ma, Miss Frizzle, dobbiamo concentrarci su Albuquerque!

translation.en: Trust me, Arnold. Doing your balloon work is the safest course of action.
translation.it: Fidati, Arnold. Fare i compiti in quota è la via più sicura.

translation.en: And isn't that what you want, to be safe and calm?
translation.it: Non vuoi stare sereno e al sicuro?

translation.en: -But how is homework... -Uh-uh-uh!
translation.it: - Ma i compiti a casa… - Ah.

translation.en: ...uh, I mean balloon work, going to help us?
You'll find the books on this balloon are extremely relevant. Read aloud, please.
translation.it: Questi libri sono molto pertinenti. Leggete ad alta voce.

translation.en: -[screams] -Whoa! Holographic books!
[chuckles] Right... holographic books.
"Just like the burners on our balloon, the Sun warms the Earth's air.
translation.it: "Come i bruciatori nel pallone il Sole scalda l'aria terrestre.

translation.en: But it warms up some parts of the Earth more, like near the Equator,
translation.it: Ma scalda di più le aree vicino all'equatore

translation.en: and less in other parts, like the North and South Poles."
translation.it: e meno quelle ai poli nord e sud."

translation.en: [DA] "That causes a difference in air pressure that would start air moving from the Equator to the poles and back again."
translation.it: "La differenza di pressione muove l'aria dall'equatore ai poli e viceversa."

translation.en: Well read, you two. Thank you.
Hey, welcome back, Lefty!
How can she be so calm? Especially when we're under so much pressure!
translation.it: - È così calma, come fa? - E sotto questa pressione!

translation.en: Ah, pressure! Yeah, that reminds me.
Tim, you make a great balloon.
Uh... why is this happening? And why do I feel so full?
translation.it: Cosa succede? E perché mi sento così pieno?

translation.en: Because of the pressure from all that air squeezed together inside you.
translation.it: Per via della pressione dell'aria dentro di te.

translation.en: What happens when you really let the pressure out?
-[air splutters] -[girls] Tim!
What? I'm a balloon!
The air rushes outside to where the air pressure is lower!
translation.it: L'aria va dove la pressione è più bassa!

translation.en: Maybe that's what makes air currents, air rushing from places with high pressure to low pressure!
translation.it: Questo crea le correnti: l'aria si muove da zone di alta pressione a zone di bassa.

translation.en: So if we find an air current moving in the right direction...
translation.it: Se troviamo una corrente ben diretta,

translation.en: ...and we raise and lower the balloon at the right time to put ourselves in its path...
translation.it: muovendo su e giù il pallone per agganciarla,

translation.en: ...we'll catch the current!
Fire it up!
[Jyoti] It's working! We're moving!
Looks like we're headed northwest to Albuquerque.
Fortuitous!
-I'm starting to think we got this! -[air splutters]
-[Tim] Whoa! -Oh, no! Tim!
[screams] I wanna be a balloon again!
[Ms. Frizzle] Gotcha!
-[thuds] -Let's never do that again!
And you won't have to 'cause you've had your turn as a balloon.
translation.it: No, hai avuto il tuo turno da palloncino.

translation.en: Ladies, who's next?
Oh, oh!
[Carlos] That storm is moving fast.
But then, so are we.
I know, and at least we're going more or less in the right direction.
translation.it: Lo so. E almeno andiamo nella giusta direzione?

translation.en: Found it!
Awww! I was hoping the lightning had split my lunch into three, too.
translation.it: Il fulmine non ha creato tre pranzi.

translation.en: [chuckles] Hungry, are ya?
Aren't we too high up in the air to go fishing?
translation.it: Non siamo troppo alti per pescare?

translation.en: And how can you catch anything at this speed? We're going, like, 112 kilometers per hour!
translation.it: E non andiamo troppo veloci? Voliamo a 112 km all'ora!

translation.en: That's 70 miles an hour, but it sounds more impressive in metric.
translation.it: Settanta miglia, ma fa più colpo in metri.

translation.en: Whoa! I got somethin'!
Actually, it feels like it might be... Whoa! This might be something!
translation.it: Ehi! Ho qualcosa. Anzi, sembra… Ferma. Può essere grosso!

translation.en: Almost... got it.
-[object whooshes] -Whoa! What is it?
[Ralphie] It's your phone!
[Ms. Frizzle] Don't be silly, Ralphie. [snorts] It's a pineapple! That can only mean one thing!
translation.it: Che sciocco. È un frutto esotico e significa una cosa sola.

translation.en: That you found the weirdest fishing hole of all time?
We must be in... the Pineapple Express!
What's the Pineapple Express?
It's a Hawaiian special delivery service. Let me show you what I'm talking about.
translation.it: Un servizio di consegna hawaiano. Ve lo mostro.

translation.en: -Going up! -[flames roar]
[Keesha] Wow! We're so high up!
And you'd think we'd have better reception.
Hello, room service? Would you send up a room?
translation.it: Pronto, servizio in camera? Me lo mandate su?

translation.en: Ohh! What? Can't you see that's funny? Here, try these.
I can't tell if this is serious or just seriously weird.
translation.it: Non so se è seria o seriamente strana.

translation.en: Whoa! Check it out, Keesha!
These glasses let you actually see the air currents moving through the sky!
translation.it: Ti fanno vedere le correnti che si muovono nel cielo!

translation.en: [Carlos] That air current is massive, like a river of air!
translation.it: È enorme, sembra un fiume d'aria.

translation.en: Exactly. People call that river of air the Pineapple Express.
translation.it: Esatto. Quel fiume atmosferico è chiamato Pineapple Express.

translation.en: [Ralphie] That thing is way bigger than a normal river!
translation.it: È molto più grande di un fiume normale!

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Atmospheric rivers can be over 100 miles wide and over 1,000 miles long!
translation.it: Possono essere larghi 100 miglia e lunghi 1000.

translation.en: Or over 160 kilometers wide and over 1,609 kilometers long. You're right, it does sound more impressive in metric.
translation.it: O larghi 160 km e lunghi 1600 km. Avevi ragione, fa più colpo in metri.

translation.en: This one goes all the way from Hawaii to California. Wow!
translation.it: Questo va dalle Hawaii alla California.

translation.en: And it carries storms and rain...
And all sorts of other weather.
Weather from Hawaii can go to California? That's crazy!
translation.it: Il tempo delle Hawaii arriva in California? Assurdo.

translation.en: So... the whole planet is connected.
Air currents carry weather from one part of the Earth to another!
translation.it: Le correnti portano il tempo da un capo all'altro.

translation.en: Bingo! Oh, wait, back up. Not bingo yet. I still need one more group scream from you all to get the full row.
translation.it: Bingo! Oh, non ancora. Manca un altro grido di gruppo.

translation.en: So, the storm's been following us because it's in the same atmospheric river as we are!
translation.it: La tempesta ci segue perché è nello stesso fiume atmosferico.

translation.en: Yup. That big air current is carrying a ton of moisture from the tropics
translation.it: Sì. Trasporta tonnellate di umidità dai tropici

translation.en: to the West Coast. Once this "river" hits land, the water vapor will cool...
translation.it: alla costa ovest. Quando tocca terra, il vapore acqueo si raffredda…

translation.en: And make rain!
So it sounds like we can ride this sky river back to the West Coast!
translation.it: Ci può portare fino alla costa ovest!

translation.en: Yep! As soon as we get into the current.
-Going down! -[kids] Whoaaaa!
[Ms. Frizzle] Bingo!
[groans] The FrizzPad is still acting up!
I can't call the other two groups to check in.
But I can see them on the map.
And the other two balloons are making their way to Albuquerque! Yes!
translation.it: Entrambi i palloni vanno verso Albuquerque! Sì!

translation.en: Excellent! We have a real shot at saving Ms. Frizzle, Arnold!
Then this birthday trip might be OK after all!
translation.it: Forse questa gita di compleanno sarà bella!

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! -Tsk-tsk.
translation.it: - E vai! - Ah, ah. Prima la sicurezza, Arnold.

translation.en: Safety first, Arnold. No jumping on the balloon.
translation.it: - E vai! - Ah, ah. Prima la sicurezza, Arnold. Non si salta nel pallone. Mettete questi e studiate.

translation.en: Now here, put these on and get back to your studies.
translation.it: Non si salta nel pallone. Mettete questi e studiate.

translation.en: Life vests? Those are for water and we're flying completely over dry land.
translation.it: Giubbotti salvagente? Sono per l'acqua e noi siamo sopra la terra.

translation.en: Salutem primum, that's my motto. It means "Safety first."
translation.it: Salutem primum. È il mio motto. La sicurezza prima di tutto.

translation.en: Liz, I have a vest for you too!
Onward and westward to Albuquerque!
[Ralphie] Wow! All that rain made it from Hawaii to California.
translation.it: Wow! La pioggia è arrivata in California dalle Hawaii.

translation.en: [Carlos] Just like us.
We rode the same air current as the storm. It's all connected.
translation.it: Era la stessa corrente. È tutto connesso!

translation.en: Now we just have to connect our Frizzle fragments.
translation.it: Riuniremo i frammenti di Miss Frizzle.

translation.en: On to Albuquerque!
-Are we there yet? -[Ms. Frizzle] Arnold.
-[screams] -We use the buddy system here.
translation.it: Arnold. Si resta in coppia. Dov'è la tua?

translation.en: Where's your buddy?
translation.it: Si resta in coppia. Dov'è la tua?

translation.en: There's only one other kid on the whole balloon!
Sorry, Liz. One kid and one lizard.
translation.it: Scusami, Liz. Una bambina e una lucertola.

translation.en: -What? Why? -[Ms. Frizzle] Safety first, Arnold!
You'll all be buddies. Please take a seat.
translation.it: Sarete una coppia a tre. Sedetevi.

translation.en: I'll be over there grading papers.
What papers?
The two essays she made me write on prevailing winds. They're for extra credit!
translation.it: I due temi sui venti. Valgono crediti extra.

translation.en: Anyway, I'm sure Ms. Frizzle knows what she's doing.
Are you? This Ms. Frizzle is afraid to take chances, make mistakes.
translation.it: Davvero? Miss Frizzle ha paura di rischiare e sbagliare.

translation.en: And something tells me she doesn't like getting messy.
translation.it: E credo che non voglia mettersi nei guai.

translation.en: We might need to save her from herself.
-But how? -Let's see where we are.
-[beeps] -Oh, no! This says we're near Ontario, Canada!
translation.it: Oh, no! Siamo vicini all'Ontario, Canada!

translation.en: That's way off course from Albuquerque!
No! How did that happen?
[Arnold] Um, New Mexico is this way!
We have to find a different air current and change course, fast!
translation.it: Troviamo un'altra corrente d'aria e cambiamo rotta! Subito!

translation.en: Arnold! What are you doing?
I'm taking chances and getting messy-y-y!
translation.it: Rischio e mi metto nei guai!

translation.en: Wha... Huh?
And that's why we wear life jackets. I heard all the commotion and lowered the balloon.
translation.it: Ecco spiegati i salvagente. Vi ho sentiti e ho portato giù il pallone.

translation.en: Salutem primum, remember?
Uh... thanks?
Are we going to go back up in the sky?
Oh, absolutely not, Dorothy Ann. From here on out, we're sticking much closer to the ground.
translation.it: Certo che no, Dorothy Ann. Ora non ci staccheremo molto da terra.

translation.en: But don't we have to go up to make it to Albuquerque before you fade away?
translation.it: Ma dobbiamo raggiungere Albuquerque prima che svanisca.

translation.en: Probably. But I am not going to risk losing a student again. So unprofessional!
translation.it: È probabile, ma non rischierò un alunno. Non è professionale!

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle? Why are we in Ontario?
translation.it: Miss Frizzle, perché siamo in Ontario? È fuori rotta.

translation.en: -We're way off course. -Excellent question, Arnold.
translation.it: Miss Frizzle, perché siamo in Ontario? È fuori rotta. Ottima domanda, Arnold.

translation.en: You see, the map is flat, but the Earth is not.
translation.it: Vedi, la mappa è piatta, ma la Terra no.

translation.en: The air doesn't move in a straight line. Since the Earth is round and always rotating...
translation.it: L'aria non si muove in linea retta, perché la Terra è tonda e ruota.…

translation.en: [Arnold] Air currents curve! [Ms. Frizzle] Correct! It's called the Coriolis effect.
translation.it: - Le correnti curvano! - Esatto. È detta forza di Coriolis.

translation.en: The Coriolis effect?
Yes! It was in the homework.
translation.it: Sì! Era nei compiti a casa.

translation.en: -Ahem? -I mean "balloon work."
If the Earth stood still, air could flow straight north and south.
translation.it: Se la Terra stesse ferma, l'aria andrebbe dritta a Nord e Sud.

translation.en: But since the Earth turns, it makes the air currents curve.
translation.it: Ma la rotazione fa curvare le correnti d'aria.

translation.en: Air currents in the northern hemisphere are always pulled to the right
translation.it: Nell'emisfero nord le correnti sono spinte a destra

translation.en: and in the southern hemisphere, they're pulled to the left.
So, since we're in the northern hemisphere, we're getting pulled to the right.
translation.it: Dato che siamo nell'emisfero nord, ci spostano a destra.

translation.en: We started in Nova Scotia, trying to go straight to Albuquerque.
translation.it: Dalla Nuova Scozia volevamo raggiungere Albuquerque.

translation.en: But because air currents curve, we got pulled to the right towards Ontario.
translation.it: Ma curvando, le correnti ci hanno spinti a destra verso l'Ontario.

translation.en: Very good, Arnold. That was a rewarding teachable moment, don't you think?
translation.it: Ottimo, Arnold. Un bell'insegnamento, non credi?

translation.en: But we don't need teachable moments. We need to find a current that's going the right way!
translation.it: Non ci servono insegnamenti. Ci serve la corrente giusta!

translation.en: The safe way is the right way, Arnold.
translation.it: La via sicura è quella giusta.

translation.en: Is it?
Incredible. Fiona Frizzle is literally flipping out.
translation.it: A Fiona Frizzle sono saltati letteralmente i nervi.

translation.en: I'm tired of being cooped up in this balloon! I want to do something extreme!
translation.it: Basta con la reclusione. Devo fare qualcosa di estremo!

translation.en: -Ms. Frizzle! -No!
I want to ride a killer whale! I want to take a selfie with Big Foot!
I want to climb Kilimanjaro on my hands!
translation.it: Scalare il Kilimangiaro con le mani!

translation.en: How far are we from Albuquerque? We've been going straight north for a while, so I bet we're...
translation.it: - Quanto manca ad Albuquerque? - Andiamo dritti a nord da un po', quindi…

translation.en: -[beeps] -This can't be right!
translation.it: - Quanto manca ad Albuquerque? - Andiamo dritti a nord da un po', quindi… Non può essere! Dice che siamo…

translation.en: This says we're in...
translation.it: Non può essere! Dice che siamo…

translation.en: Alabama?!
[Wanda] What? How did we go this far east?
I thought we were going north.
-Perplexing! -[phone rings]
-[beeps] -Keesha! Arnold!
-How are you guys doing? -We're almost to Arizona!
translation.it: Keesha! Arnold! Come va? - Siamo quasi in Arizona! - Non è così.

translation.en: -[Carlos] No, we aren't. -What?
translation.it: - Siamo quasi in Arizona! - Non è così. Cosa?

translation.en: Sad but true. We're drifting up the coast of California.
And we're nowhere near because I fell out of the basket
translation.it: Noi siamo lontani perché sono caduto

translation.en: and Ms. Frizzle will only fly a few feet off the ground!
translation.it: e ora Miss Frizzle vola a pochi metri da terra.

translation.en: We have problems here, too.
We started out heading straight north, but somehow we're hundreds of miles off track.
translation.it: Andavamo verso nord, ma siamo totalmente fuori rotta.

translation.en: That's because air currents curve. It's the Coriolis effect.
translation.it: Perché le correnti d'aria curvano. È la forza di Coriolis. Vero, Miss Frizzle?

translation.en: Right, Ms. Frizzle?
translation.it: È la forza di Coriolis. Vero, Miss Frizzle?

translation.en: -Good point, Arnold. -Ms. Frizzle!
Hey, by the way, what's a gust of wind's favorite color?
-Blue! [laughs] -Whoa! Frizz, come back!
translation.it: - Qual buon vento! - Miss Friz! Torni!

translation.en: I'll be here all night! No, I won't.
translation.it: Starò qui tutta la notte. No.

translation.en: This is not funny!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes, it is!
Was that it? Are they gone forever?
Guys, our Frizzle just disappeared!
translation.it: Ragazzi, la nostra Frizzle è svanita!

translation.en: -[static crackles] -[Keesha] No! Not now! The call dropped!
translation.it: Non ora! È caduta la linea!

translation.en: Guys?
We're on our own.
No FrizzPad and no Frizz? According to my calculations, it's time to panic!
translation.it: Senza Tablet né Friz! Secondo i miei calcoli, è ora del panico!

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle, you're back!
-You faded all the way out! -For a full three minutes!
translation.it: - Miss Frizzle, eccola! - Era scomparsa. Per tre minuti!

translation.en: We have to go faster!
We've got to get back up in the sky before we run out of time!
translation.it: Torniamo in cielo prima che sia tardi!

translation.en: And I'll try to figure out when that will be.
I'm sorry, class, but staying low is the only safe course.
translation.it: Desolata, ma restare bassi è l'unica via sicura.

translation.en: Salutem primum--
No! The time for being safe is over!
translation.it: - Salutem primum… - No! Non è più quel momento.

translation.en: If we're going to save you, we have to take chances,
make some big mistakes and get really messy!
Whoa! Arnold!
I'm sorry, Ms. Frizzle, but I'm taking over!
translation.it: Scusi, Miss Frizzle, ma ora comando io.

translation.en: Arnold, this is another teachable moment.
And the lesson is that it wouldn't be safe to challenge a Ballooning Buccaneer.
translation.it: Non è sicuro sfidare un pirata delle mongolfiere.

translation.en: -I surrender. -[sighs] Thank you.
DA, do whatever you can to get everybody back on the FrizzPad.
translation.it: Grazie. DA… - cerca di connettere tutti al Tablet. - Sì, subito.

translation.en: Right! Already on it!
translation.it: - cerca di connettere tutti al Tablet. - Sì, subito.

translation.en: It's time for a full-scale Frizz Mutiny!
[Arnold] It's up to us...
...to save the day!
-Come on, hand over the whoopee cushion. -[Ms. Frizzle splutters]
translation.it: Forza! Mi dia il cuscino dei peti.

translation.en: Awww, but I need it to teach you a lesson about air pressure!
translation.it: Mi serve per insegnarvi la pressione atmosferica.

translation.en: Air currents!
Sorry. We can't have you distracting us right now. There's too much at stake.
translation.it: Non può distrarci. La posta in gioco è troppo alta.

translation.en: At least let me keep my parachute. Please!
translation.it: Lasciatemi almeno il paracadute. Vi prego.

translation.en: So you can use it to teach us more about how air currents work, right?
translation.it: Per altre lezioni sulle correnti d'aria?

translation.en: Well, I was going to say because it's awesome, but...
Unacceptable! You can tell Arnold we're good.
-[phone beeps] -We've got all of Fiona's daredevil gear. We're distraction-free!
translation.it: Arnesi di Fiona requisiti. Non ci distrarrà.

translation.en: That's great! We sent you info about the Coriolis effect.
translation.it: Bene! Avete il rapporto su Coriolis.

translation.en: You should be able to figure out a better path to Albuquerque now!
We got it, Arnold. But it's not like we can just make the balloons go straight to Albuquerque.
translation.it: Sì, Arnold. Ma non possiamo far andare i palloni ad Albuquerque.

translation.en: We can still only go where the air currents are going.
Our Frizzles are fading! We have to get them together before they're gone for good!
translation.it: La nostra Friz svanisce. Presto non tornerà più.

translation.en: [Keesha] How do we get there fast enough?
Wait a minute!
We keep treating these baskets like they're just hot-air balloon baskets.
translation.it: Le trattiamo come ceste da mongolfiera, ma non lo sono.

translation.en: -But they aren't! -Yes!
translation.it: Le trattiamo come ceste da mongolfiera, ma non lo sono. Sì! Sono parti del magico scuolabus!

translation.en: They're each part of the Magic School Bus!
translation.it: Sì! Sono parti del magico scuolabus!

translation.en: And we might have just enough magic left for one last ride!
translation.it: Forse la magia è sufficiente per un ultimo giro!

translation.en: If air moves from high pressure to low pressure,
is there some kind of Bus magic that could create high pressure behind us
translation.it: Una magia potrebbe creare alta pressione dietro di noi

translation.en: to push us forward?
Amazing!
[Ms. Frizzle] Yes! Whoo-hoo!
How did you guys do that? Liz found a lever under the seat.
translation.it: - Come avete fatto? - Liz ha trovato una leva sotto al sedile.

translation.en: Found it!
I can see it! I can see it!
The machine's squeezing the air together into high pressure behind us...
translation.it: La macchina comprime aria in alta pressione dietro di noi…

translation.en: [Carlos] And it's spreading the air out into low pressure in front of us.
translation.it: E diffonde aria a bassa pressione davanti a noi.

translation.en: [Ralphie] So the air's rushing from the high pressure to the low pressure! Yee-ha!
translation.it: E l'aria passa dall'alta pressione alla bassa! Evviva!

translation.en: We're making our own air currents! And at this speed...
translation.it: Creiamo le correnti! E di questo passo…

translation.en: ...we might just make it to Albuquerque in time!
-[static crackles] -[Arnold] Here's the plan.
We get to Albuquerque, and when we can see each other,
we get our balloons as close together as possible.
And when we're close enough, we line up the Frizzle fragments.
translation.it: e allineiamo i frammenti di Miss Frizzle.

translation.en: -[static crackles] -[Ralphie] Arnold?
The Frizz is almost completely gone!
You've reached the voicemail of the Frizz. I'm not here to take your call.
translation.it: Questa è la segreteria di Miss Friz. Non posso rispondere.

translation.en: -[kids] No! -Just kidding!
Or am I? Am I... am I... am I?
Is she g-g-gone?
Not yet.
There's still some hula left.
-We'll be in Albuquerque soon! -Great news!
translation.it: Stiamo per arrivare. Ottime notizie! Iniziavo a preoccuparmi.

translation.en: I was starting to get the tiniest bit worried.
Up high!
What happened to our Frizzle fragment? -Is she OK? -[Ms. Frizzle snaps fingers]
translation.it: Cosa succede al nostro frammento? Sta bene?

translation.en: I think we're good.
Uh... down low?
We're too late!
Ms. Frizzle is fading away!
Now, now. Keep your head. And I'll keep mine, too.
translation.it: Non perdete la testa. Lo farò anch'io.

translation.en: Good catch, Dorothy Ann! Are... are you OK?
translation.it: - Bella presa, Dorothy Ann. - Sta bene?

translation.en: I'm perfectly fine, Arnold. But I don't think the rest of me is coming back this time.
translation.it: Benissimo, Arnold. Ma non credo che il resto torni stavolta.

translation.en: Arnold, hold Ms. Frizzle for a second.
So, I've been keeping track.
Ms. Frizzle's body parts faded and then came back. Then her body faded...
translation.it: È svanita e tornata in parti, poi è svanito il corpo…

translation.en: And then came back.
And now her body parts have faded again. And they don't seem to be coming back.
translation.it: - È di nuovo svanita in parti. - Che non riappaiono.

translation.en: I see a pattern, and if it holds,
translation.it: Vedo uno schema, e se regge,

translation.en: we only have 15 minutes to get them back together or Ms. Frizzle is gone for good!
translation.it: abbiamo 15 minuti o Miss Frizzle sparirà per sempre!

translation.en: The FrizzPad is fully back online!
Then let's patch everyone in!
It's good to hear from everyone, but I have unsettling news.
translation.it: È bello sentirvi tutti, ma ho notizie sconvolgenti.

translation.en: Besides the fact that we have less than 15 minutes to get our Frizzle fragments back together?
translation.it: Oltre a quella dei 15 minuti per riunire i frammenti?

translation.en: Yes. That storm is still following us!
translation.it: Sì. Quella tempesta ci segue ancora.

translation.en: The air current we created is bringing the storm, too.
translation.it: La corrente creata la porta dietro.

translation.en: What'll happen if it catches up with us?
Just do what you can to stay ahead of it. Time is running out!
translation.it: Cerca di precederla. Resta poco tempo!

translation.en: We're getting near New Mexico, but we have to go faster!
translation.it: Più veloci verso il Nuovo Messico.

translation.en: I see the storm that got us into all this trouble in the first place!
translation.it: Vedo la tempesta che ha causato i guai!

translation.en: We'll have to go around it!
But if you put it behind you, what's to say you won't drag it along with you?
translation.it: Se te la lasci dietro, non la trascinerai con te?

translation.en: Uh, guys? What happens if the storms crash together?
translation.it: Ragazzi, e se le tempeste si scontrano?

translation.en: I don't see any other choice!
translation.it: Non abbiamo scelta. Non c'è più tempo.

translation.en: There isn't any time left, and if we want to save Ms. Frizzle,
translation.it: Non abbiamo scelta. Non c'è più tempo. Per salvare Miss Frizzle va superata la tempesta.

translation.en: we've got to get past this storm.
translation.it: Per salvare Miss Frizzle va superata la tempesta.

translation.en: We all have to amp up our currents!
I... I don't think we're going to make it in time!
translation.it: Non credo che arriveremo in tempo.

translation.en: -[thunder] -I can see you guys! We're almost together!
Grab your Frizzle fragments so we can line them up!
-We're really going to do it! -[Tim] Uh... Jyoti...?
Those storm clouds are getting awfully close!
[Keesha] Just keep ahead of them!
[Arnold] Looks like we're gonna miss each other!
We have to move our pressure systems to turn and swing back around! Now!
translation.it: Spostiamo i sistemi di pressione per tornare indietro! Ora!

translation.en: Whoa... Wh-What's going on?
According to my research, atmospheric rivers are common,
translation.it: Secondo la mia ricerca, possono esserci sei o più fiumi atmosferici

translation.en: with as many as six or more present globally at any given time!
translation.it: Secondo la mia ricerca, possono esserci sei o più fiumi atmosferici nel globo in ogni momento. Ma nessuno ne crea uno.

translation.en: But people don't usually make their own!
translation.it: nel globo in ogni momento. Ma nessuno ne crea uno.

translation.en: We brought a whole bunch of high and low-pressure systems together.
translation.it: Abbiamo unito troppi sistemi ad alta e bassa pressione.

translation.en: When they start swirling around each other, it will make...
A hurricane!
[DA] Hurricanes happen at sea!
And this is over land, so technically it's...
a tornado!
-Very good, DA. -[tornado rumbles]
[Arnold] Hang on, everyone!
Help!
Only 30 seconds left. This is it!
Don't give up!
Hold on to your Frizzle fragments! We can do this!
translation.it: Tenete i frammenti di Miss Frizzle! Possiamo farcela!

translation.en: Come on, come on!
-[sparks sizzle] -Arnold! Look! Look!
[Arnold] Ms. Frizzle!
[Tim] It's working!
Whoa!
[Ms. Frizzle] Wa-hoooo!
[Keesha] You did it, Arnold!
We did it!
Just in time for us to go down in a tornado!
translation.it: Abbiamo mancato di poco il tornado.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] Would you look at that pressure system?
[kids] Ms. Frizzle!
Yup, it's me! Reunited at last. And it feels...
translation.it: Sì, sono io. Tutta insieme, finalmente. Una sensazione…

translation.en: Turbulent!
I was going to say magical, but sure. Here we go!
translation.it: Avrei detto magica, ma certo. Ecco fatto!

translation.en: OK, class. We need to counter what caused this storm. Thoughts?
translation.it: Ok, ragazzi, discutiamo. Cos'ha causato la tempesta?

translation.en: Could we switch the high and low-pressure areas?
Interesting.
[Jyoti] Right now the air from the high-pressure areas keeps trying to move to the low-pressure areas.
translation.it: L'aria si muove ancora da zone di alta a zone di bassa pressione.

translation.en: It's pushing the air around and around in a circle.
I get it! But if we reverse the areas of the high and low pressure,
translation.it: Ci sono! Invertendo le zone di alta e bassa pressione,

translation.en: then the air would start moving the opposite way.
And slow the tornado down.
Or maybe even stop it!
No one's ever tried this before, but I'm pretty sure no one's ever had to!
translation.it: Nessuno ha mai dovuto provare a farlo.

translation.en: Well then, let's take a chance!
Seat belts, everyone!
We can do it, Ms. Frizzle! I know we can!
translation.it: Ce la faremo, Miss Frizzle! Lo so!

translation.en: We wouldn't be doing anything if you hadn't gotten me back together, Arnold.
translation.it: Grazie al fatto che mi avete rimessa insieme.

translation.en: I'm super ready to stop spinning now! [groans]
translation.it: Non ce la faccio più a girare!

translation.en: Almost there. Hold tight!
And one last little trick.
Just a little low pressure in the distance to send the storm away from the Balloon Fiesta.
translation.it: Bassa pressione per rasserenare la Fiesta della Mongolfiera.

translation.en: -[Bus honks] -Ms. Frizzle, welcome back! And in one piece, not three!
translation.it: - Miss Frizzle! Bentornata! - In un pezzo solo.

translation.en: Ahhh, it's good to be back! I owe some of you a big thanks for laughing at my jokes,
translation.it: È bello! Ringrazio chi ha riso alle mie battute,

translation.en: some others for saving me from a waterfall,
translation.it: chi mi ha salvato dalle rapide

translation.en: and I think I owe a couple of you grades on balloon work!
translation.it: e chi aspetta i voti per i compiti in quota.

translation.en: -It's still your birthday trip, Arnold. -What do you want to do now?
translation.it: - È ancora la tua festa, Arn. - Che vuoi fare?

translation.en: -Something on the ground, I hope. -[kids laugh]
Yeah, Arnold. I bet you're ready to head home and stay there!
translation.it: Sì, Arnold. Vorrai tornare a casa e restarci.

translation.en: Actually... let's go where the wind takes us.
translation.it: A dire il vero, andiamo dove ci porta il vento.

translation.en: Good call, Arnold!
-Yeah. The Balloon Fiesta is awesome! -Stunning!
translation.it: - La Fiesta della Mongolfiera è forte! - Favolosa!

translation.en: [Keesha] Look at all those balloons riding the air currents.
translation.it: Tutti quei palloni che cavalcano l'aria.

translation.en: From high pressure to low stress.
[sighs] Oh, this is truly gorgeous. I should really take a group picture.
translation.it: È meraviglioso. Devo fare una foto di gruppo.

translation.en: Hey, everybody get together!
-Now smile! -[camera clicks]
That's the problem with these pineapple phones. The reception's fine, but the camera is awful.
translation.it: Che guaio, i telefoni ananas. Ricevono bene, ma fotografano male.

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hooooo!
I've never felt so...
alive! Whoo-hoo!
-[beeps] -Fiona Frizzle here, currently available to answer questions!
[kid] Hey, Ms. Frizzle! Hot-air balloons are amazing! Can I take one back and forth to school every day?
translation.it: Salve, Miss Frizzle! Posso andare a scuola in mongolfiera ogni giorno?

translation.en: I love the way you think, kid.
But remember, there's no way to steer a balloon
translation.it: Ma ricorda, puoi guidarla solo regolando l'altezza

translation.en: other than by adjusting the altitude to catch different air currents.
translation.it: Ma ricorda, puoi guidarla solo regolando l'altezza per catturare le correnti. E non ci sono neanche i freni.

translation.en: There aren't any brakes on a hot-air balloon either.
translation.it: per catturare le correnti. E non ci sono neanche i freni.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's my kind of aircraft!
You'll need to know the wind speed and direction both on the ground and where it was...
translation.it: Devi conoscere i venti, sia a terra che…

translation.en: [laughs] Gotcha!
[chuckles] This is funny!
-[balloons inflate] -Hello.
Some balloon pilots even release a helium balloon
translation.it: Alcuni usano palloni a elio per vedere che succede

translation.en: to see what happens to it as it goes up, but I like my version better!
translation.it: Alcuni usano palloni a elio per vedere che succede in quota. Io preferisco la mia versione!

translation.en: Hey, how's the weather up there?
I'll tell you when I get down!
-[laughs] Nice catch! -Thank you.
[kid] There's no way they could have made it from Hawaii, Peru, and Nova Scotia to Albuquerque in the same day!
translation.it: Impossibile fare Hawaii, Perù, Nuova Scozia e Albuquerque in giornata.

translation.en: That's true. We used a little Bus magic to get everyone together in time.
translation.it: È vero. Abbiamo usato un po' della magia dello scuolabus.

translation.en: Without Bus magic, a balloon's speed is as changeable as the wind.
translation.it: Senza, la velocità del pallone cambia come il vento.

translation.en: But these babies can move fast!
You can take one all the way around the world in just over 11 days!
translation.it: Possono fare il giro del mondo in 11 giorni!

translation.en: Ehhh! Over there!
-Got your phone! -Nice one!
[kid] One last question.
How exactly did the class create a tornado when they were reuniting?
translation.it: come hanno fatto a creare un tornado mentre si riunivano? E cos'è un tornado? Una grande tempesta?

translation.en: And what is a tornado anyway? Just a big storm?
translation.it: mentre si riunivano? E cos'è un tornado? Una grande tempesta?

translation.en: Remember, each of the three...
Each of the three balloons had high pressure behind it and low pressure areas leading the way.
translation.it: …palloni aveva alta pressione dietro e bassa pressione davanti.

translation.en: [The Frizz] Yeah!
And when all of those high and low pressure areas got together,
translation.it: E lo scontro tra queste zone diverse

translation.en: it made the perfect conditions for a whirling, swirling,
low-pressure storm called a cyclone, baby!
translation.it: a bassa pressione chiamata ciclone, tesoro!

translation.en: It just depends on where the storm takes place.
Storms on the ocean are hurricanes or monsoons; storms over land are tornadoes.
translation.it: Sull'oceano sono uragani o cicloni, a terra sono tornado.

translation.en: [kid] Whatever it was, it was very cool! Thanks, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.it: Comunque sia, era bello! Grazie, Miss Frizzle.

translation.en: [all three] You're welcome!
Goodbye, now!
Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoooo!
-[horn honks] -[Ms. Frizzle] Seat belts, everyone!
[Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
translation.it: Fa' che sia solo una semplice gita.

translation.en: -[Wanda] With the Frizz? -[kids] No way!
♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪
♪ You're relaxed and feeling good ♪
♪ Next thing that you know ♪
-♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo!
♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
♪ Surfing on a soundwave ♪
-♪ Or swinging through the stars ♪ -Yee-ha!
♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪
♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Navigate a nostril ♪ -[Ralphie sneezes]
♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Raft a river of lava ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete ♪
♪ You might get baked into a pie ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Step in, step in, step inside ♪
♪ It's a wilder ride, come on! ♪
translation.it: Entrate, è una corsa selvaggia Forza!

translation.en: ♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
